name: 8 ways to keep your dog happy over Christmas
summary:
Ho, Ho, Ho and a Merry Christmas!

It’s that time of year again – a most wonderful time of the year – and yet for dog owners and pet parents, it’s one of those holiday times when things can get a little stretching when it comes to keeping our canine companions happy.

Is your dog worried about novelty (trees and decorations, presents, noisy kids' toys, strangely dressed people or strangers in general)?

Does your dog struggle to keep their paws to themselves (jumping up, barking and general overexcitement around guests and visitors)?

Have you got a four-legged friend that’s far too interested in the tasty (and potentially toxic) foods displayed on the dinner table?

What if your dog struggles being away from you or left home alone and you’ve got a busy Christmas ahead and can’t take them with you, or have them with you all the time?

In this episode of the Sexier than a Squirrel podcast, Santa is coming early and we have gifts galore for YOU! Tom and Lauren are bringing you ALL their favourite tips, tricks, hacks,...
